title: Leading ICT Service Exporter
description: In 2023, Israel's ICT service exports accounted for 61.77% of its total service exports, marking it as a global leader in this sector.

title: Top Investor in Research and Development
description: Israel allocated 6.02% of its GDP to research and development in 2022, one of the highest percentages globally, showcasing its commitment to innovation.

title: Universal Female Secondary Education Enrollment
description: In 2015, Israel achieved a 100% net enrollment rate for females in secondary education, highlighting its dedication to gender equality in education.

title: Low Mortality from Non-Communicable Diseases
description: In 2021, Israel reported an 8.9% mortality rate from CVD, cancer, diabetes, or CRD among males aged 30 to 70, one of the lowest rates worldwide.
